scripts.bootstrap: npm -w infra install && npm -w frontend install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm -w frontend run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cargo fmt --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml --all -- --check && cargo clippy --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml --all-targets -- -D warnings
